1.content: On an ordinary night seemly like any other, something strange is about to happen to John.
1.title: The begining.

choices: Once inside Kyle makes a wish.
Kyle sees one of his neighbors and makes a wish first.
111.content:
John and Kyle just got back from the movies and pulled into the apartment complex parking lot.

"Well that was the worst Space Wars movie yet." Kyle said slamming the car door shut. "It could have been better but I thought it was ok." John said getting out of the driver's side. Truth be told it was a bad movie. John started toward's their apartment building when he noticed Kyle wasn't following him.

John turned around to see him staring at the sky. "What are you looking at dude?" He asked. Kyle pointed. "Do you see that rainbow?" John laughed. "Come on are you really amazed by a stupid rainbow?"

"This one looks funny to me somehow. It looks like its ending in the woods over there." He said transfixed a the sight in the sky. John squinted. It did kind of look like it was going into the woods, but that was impossible. Rainbows don't have ends. They are just an illusion. It appeared to start somewhere far away then grew larger down into the trees next to the apartments.

"Don't be silly." John said about to turn around to go up to his apartment when Kyle took off running out of the parking lot into the woods. John sighed then followed him in.

"Kyle slow down. There might be coyotes out here or something." John said panting. Kyle slowed down. John understood why. The forest was dark but there was a colorful glow coming out of the darkness. They approached cautiously and came to a clearing with a dazing and blinding rainbow light where the rainbow ended. They shielded their eyes and approached where it touched the ground. As soon as they reached it the light went out.

It took a minute for their eyes to readjust the darkness. In the middle of the clearing in front of them was a black iron cauldron. "Holy shit the pot of gold at the end of the rainbow!" Exclaimed Kyle. He put his hands on the rim and peered inside. He frowned then bent his body over and reached deep to the bottom and pulled out a single coin. "There is only one coin." He reported holding up his hand. There was a single gold coin with the image of an ugly leprechaun glaring back at them.

John pointed at the iron cauldron. "Look there is an inscription!"

Coin of Wishing - Your hearts desire will be granted, but after one the coin shall be depleted. Don't despair, for you only have to share!

"What does that mean? You can make one wish then its depleted?" John asked. "I don't know lets see if it works. I wish I had a latte with extra whipped cream." Kyle said loudly and clearly to John's disbelief. Did he really waste a potential wish on a coffee?

To both of their amazement a latte with extra whipped cream appeared in Kyle's hand. Kyle took a sip and it left a cream mustache. "Awesome!" He exclaimed. "I wish I had a hamburger!" He said next. Nothing happened.

"I hope you didn't waste our chance at a wish." John said annoyed. Kyle looked down at the coin. "Woah its different look" He held the coin for John to see. While before the image of the leprechaun seemed to glare at them, now his eyes were closed. "Let me see." John said holding out a hand. Kyle dropped the coin in his palm.

"The eyes are open again! Maybe thats what it means that we have to share. Once you make a wish it depletes the coin until someone else makes a wish." John said. He held out his empty hand. "I wish I had a hundred dollar bill." The money appeared in his hand. This was incredible. The coin's eyes were now closed again. John handed the coin back to Kyle and the eyes opened.

"Lets get back to the apartment I am freezing out here." Kyle said. He puts the coin in his pocket and they leave the woods and towards their building.
111.title: A Leprechaun's Coin

choices: Before he makes a wish there were voices outside.
He makes a wish changing himself.
He eyes John and makes a wish changing him.
1111.content: They walk up the the steps to their second floor apartment and enter. Kyle sits down in the living room and puts his latte on the coffee table. John goes to his room first and puts his new $100 bill on his dresser. When he comes back out Kyle is holding the gold leprechaun coin in his hand eagerly.
1111.title: Once inside Kyle makes a wish.

choices: Gina Sanchez, his stunningly beautiful neighbor that lived below.
Maria Sanchez, his bbw hispanic neighbor.
11111.content:
Kyle opens his mouth to make a wish when he hears voices outside their apartment door. They were muffled women's voices. Once sounded like Lexi, one of the girls that lived in the apartment next to theirs.

"That must be Lexi and Katie coming home." Kyle said. He had a big crush on her but she never seemed to notice him. "Saaay... do you think this coin could." He cleared his throat. "Ahem I wish there was nothing Lexi wanted more in this world than to love me." He said with an evil grin gesturing towards himself.

John's jaw dropped. Did Kyle really just wish for that? What was going to happen? The talking outside stopped and the doorbell rang. Both boys stared at each other frozen and not sure what to do. Now there was knocking. "Well go answer it. You made the wish." John said.

Kyle's look of astonishment showed that he didn't actually expect anything to happen like this. He put the gold coin on the coffee table, got up and went to the entry way. John couldn't see who was there when he opened it but sat there on the couch waiting. There was some muffled speaking then he could hear the front door close. Kyle walked back into the living room holding hands and followed by Lexi! She was giggling and staring at Kyle like she was in love. Kyle looked at John wide eyed and amazed and the two went down the hall towards his room.

"Just like that." John said shaking his head and picking up the gold coin. He could see through the blinds the outline of a person still waiting out on the landing. They obviously didn't understand why their conversation was cut so short or if Lexi planned on coming back. "That must be Katie." John said in a low voice. He stood up, his heart pounding. He always had sort of a thing for Katie, but too shy to ever try and talk to her.

If Kyle could do it, why not him. He slowly walked towards the front door. "I wish that when I opened the door she would fall madly in love with me. " He said gripping the coin. He opened the door and to his surprise saw
11111.title: Before he makes a wish there were voices outside.

choices: He wishes the pregnancy on someone else but does not specify who.
Lexi snatches the coin from his hand.
Candace snatches the coin from his hand.
111111.content:
John opened the front door excitedly expecting to see Katie waiting to embrace him but to his surprise it was Candace Carter his pregnant neighbor.

https://66.media.tumblr.com/8d3f0968ddf4...

"Oh.. Hi Candace I thought you were someone else.." John began to say. Candace was giving him the most alluring gaze as she looked him up and down taking in every inch of him.

Oh god what have I done... Thought John. Candace was wearing stretchy yoga pants and an oversized maternity sweater. She was very pretty but also very pregnant.

"John did you know I adore you?" She said walking in through the front door uninvited.

"Candace, um now isn't a good time.." John said nervously. He looked at the Leprechaun's coin in his palm. The Leprechaun on the front of the coin had his eyes closed. He couldn't make another wish until someone makes a wish on this coin first what was he going to do?

She made herself at home and curled up on the couch. She patted the seat next to her. "Why don't you come on over and have a seat next to me?" She said winking.

John laughed nervously. If her husband Howard found out what was going on right now he would be pissed! "Candace I don't think its a good idea for you to be over here"

Kyle walked down the hall pulling a shirt over his head. "Hey I thought I heard you talking to someone... oh hello there." He said surprised to see Candace on their couch.

"I uh.. thought Katie was outside and you know." John said. Kyle understood. Lexi left the bedroom in her underwear and wearing one of Kyle's oversized shirts to also see what all of the commotion was about.

Candace got up and leaned over and kissed John. He blushed. "Aren't you married?" John laughed nervously. Candace pulled off her wedding ring and threw it on the ground. "I don't care about him anymore, all I want is you. I should have never had this baby." She said looking at her large bump.

An idea flashed across John's mind. Well she said it herself, what if he did pursue this relationship? He could always wish this baby onto someone else. That way Howard still has his baby just with someone else. It felt so wrong yet she suggested it.

John handed Kyle the coin. "I need you to have a turn." John said looking him in the eye seriously. Kyle understood. "Oh yeah sure. I wish I had a latte with extra whipped cream. "

The latte appeared in Kyle's hand and he took a sip of it handing the coin back to John. This was probably not a good idea. Both girls saw this latte materialize out of thin air and looked amazed and confused. Lexi was looking from the latte and back to the coin in John's hand. This might not end well if those girls find out about the wishing coin.

John looked down at his hand and the ugly leprechaun glaring at him from the coin. Did he really want to try this out with Candace?
111111.title: Candace, his 7 month pregnant neighbor.

choices: Lexi's belly swells until it is 7 months pregnant.

1111112.content:
Lexi grabbed the coin from John's hand. His heart stopped.

Kyle froze and eyed her nervously. "Did this coin just grant you a wish Kyle?" She asked.

"Well umm.." Kyle took a sip of her latte nervously. What kind of chaos could a girl magically bewitched to fall in love with Kyle cause?

Lexi looked at Candace. "You may regret your relationship with Howard, but my love for Kyle will never falter." She held up the coin and looked at if very seriously. "You may no longer want to have kids but I wish me and Kyle had a baby together."

111113.content:
Feeling his heart race he slowly turned the handle of the front door expecting to find Katie waiting for him. To his utter surprise it was not Katie standing outside, it was Maria his bbw neighbor!

https://66.media.tumblr.com/4b7b77c8b349...

"Oh hello Maria what are you doing out..." Before John could finish Maria giving him an alluring gaze stepped over the threshold of the apartment and put an arm around his neck and pressed her lips against his.

John's eyes grew wide and he froze not knowing what to do. He opened his mouth "Uh Maria.." His speech was interrupted yet again as Maria stuck her tongue in his mouth as she continued to try and passionately kiss him. John pulled away and took a few steps backwards then headed back to the living room where the magic coin was sitting on the coffee table. He was in complete shock. Never in a million years would he even imagine him and his neighbor Maria kissing like this in his apartment. She was a beautiful and curvaceous lady but she was much older than him. If anything he could have seen himself pursuing her daughter but this was so weird! He turned around to see Maria close the front door and follow him into the living room.

He jumped over the couch and reached out and grabbed the magic coin. The Leprechaun's head on the front was sleeping with his eyes closed. He could not make another wish until someone else got a chance at this coin. Maria joined him on the couch. She still gave him that alluring gaze as if she was madly in love. She put a hand over John's shoulder and put her other on his middle. "What do you want to do honey?" She rubbed him affectionately then put her hand on his upper thigh. He felt a little aroused. But he was caught off guard by the entire situation he wasn't ready to go do what Maria was suggesting.

"Well how about we uh watch some tv?" He put the coin back on the coffee table and picked up the remote and turned on the tv. Maria put her legs on the couch comfortable and snuggled with him with her head on his chest as they watched the tv.

Some time later out came Kyle with his arms around Lexi. When he saw John on the couch with Maria his mouth dropped. John mouthed the words "It was an accident!"

Kyle looked like he was trying not to burst out laughing. Him and Lexi went to the kitchen and Lexi pulled out a pan and some bacon in the fridge to make Kyle a late night breakfast. "Hello Mrs' Sanchez" Kyle said beaming.

John had one arm around Maria and with his free left hand he pointed to the magic coin and looked at Kyle expectantly. Kyle understood.

11111331.content:
"H-hey Maria, could I have that please?" John said nervously. Maria gave him a playful smile and put the hand with the coin behind her back. "Have what back?" She said innocently before giggling. She didn't realize what she was holding. She brought it out for them all to see and John could see the leprechaun on the coin with his eyes open and giving that awful grimacing stare.

"Maria want some bacon?" Kyle piped in. Lexi was almost done frying them up. "I can get you anything you need. What do you want?"

John was leaning over with an outstretched arm to grab the coin while Kyle was talking to Maria. "I just want John to be my husband." She said.

John felt something cold bind his finger. He looked down and to his surprise there was a gold ring on his finger. Maria lifted up her hand and covered her mouth with a joyous expression. She also had a ring with a diamond on it.

"Holy shit!" Kyle said then laughed.

Maria wrapped her arms around her new husband and attempted to kiss him again. Funny enough he didn't have any memory of ever marrying her. Only the rings on their fingers changed. John wondered if this was because he knew of the magic coin? There was probably a lot of variables they didn't understand about the ring.

Lexi saw Maria's ring and excitedly said "Oh my god congratulations guys!"

"Yeah congrats on the new wife dude." Kyle said laughing. "Mrs. Sanchez is a real catch."

"Thats Mrs. Powell now." Maria said crossing her arms. "Oh I stand corrected!" Kyle said grinning.

Lexi rummages through the fridge. "You guys don't have any champagne but here is a beer to celebrate!" Lexi pulled out a glass bottle of beer and shook it up. She brought it into the living room and opened it. Beer sprayed all over John's shirt. "Oops sorry!"

"God damn it Lexi." He said angrily. He got up and walked down the hall and opened up his bedroom door. To his shock all of his belongings were gone and the room was empty. "What the hell?"

Kyle followed him to see what was up. They both stared blankly into the empty room. "Maybe now that you are married you live at Maria's now."

John's heart sank. Maria was overjoyed to hear this. "Lets go home then honey to get yourself changed up!" She grabbed his arm and tried to drag him down the hall. "Hold on, um dear I will meet you outside." John said.

Once Maria was out of earshot he whispered frantically to Kyle. "Dude where is the coin we need to fix this."

"I got it." Kyle said. John held out his hand. Kyle didn't move. "Come on give it to me."

Kyle's face twisted to an evil grin. "I think you should go home with Maria tonight and try out this new life."

"What?! Hell no give it to me!" John said in shock. "Hey I slept with Lexi you should see what its like to be with Maria for a day." He stifled a laugh and tried to look serious.

"Yeah but this was an accident!" John said. Kyle had his hand in his pocket as if he was holding onto the coin. John tried to lunge for it and Kyle stepped back and held the coin in the air. "Go spend the night at Maria's tonight and I'll give it back. Just have fun man!"

Kyle wasn't giving it up. John felt like he had no choice while Kyle wielded that power in his hands. He had no choice but to follow Maria to their apartment. What about her daughter Gina? Would she be shocked to find out he married her mother? Or will she already know hes her stepdad?

They were nearing the edge of the woods an almost to the parking lot of their apartment. John was feeling kind of excited. He just used the gold coin to materialize a $100 bill out of thin air. There were unlimited possibilities of what they could do. He couldn't wait to test it out further, the only problem is that it was still Kyle's turn.

"Um Kyle what do you think you want your next wish to be." He said. "I haven't decided yet, give me a minute to think." Kyle stopped and looked back at John and saw the eager look on his face. Kyle grinned. "How about I wish you had a nice rack of perky tits?"

John felt his chest start to tingle and two mounds started to sprout from his chest. "Oh my god!" He exclaimed. He grew two perky D cup breasts. Kyle doubled over in laughter. "You have no idea how funny you look." He sputtered.

John touched them. They were so sensitive and felt so foreign to him. "I can't believe you did that." He said. Kyle handed back the coin. "You can always just wish them away man."

John glowered at him. "Well I wish you also had tits!" He said. Kyle's own chest began growing in the same way until they both had identical pairs of tits sprouting from their chests. "Holy shit these are awesome!" Kyle pulled his shirt up flashing John and shook them around. "Wooo!"

John laughed and handed him back the coin. "Now wish us back to normal and lets get inside. His nipples were started to get hard from the cold. It was getting dark.

They run into the person who was searching for this box originally.
112.content:
John and Kyle were walking down the stairs from their apartment going out to eat.

John noticed muddy tracks leaving from the forest towards the street. "Look someone was doing something in the forest." He said curriously.

"Thats kind of creepy what do you think they were doing in there?" Kyle said.

"Lets go check it out." It looks like they left.

The boys make their way into the forest. The sun wasn't down yet so they were still able to see. "Its hasn't even rained I wonder why their shoes were leaving tracks like that." John said. "Do you think they were out here burying a body or something?"

They come to a clearing in the trees. There was what looked like a pit and next to it was a shovel sticking into the ground. They stopped walking.

Hesitantly Kyle walked over and looked into the pit. "There is nothing in here." He reported. "Its pretty deep though.. woah!" He was standing on the edge and some dirt collapsed and he slid into the hole.

John ran forward. "You alright?" The hole must be almost 6 feet deep. Kyle was standing up tall and was still under the ground level. "Yeah. I wonder why someone was digging this big hole. Looks like they made some indents in the wall to climb out." Kyle put his hands and feet into some small indents carved into the dirt wall and climbed his way out. He grabbed John's hand and he pulled him up.

"That was hard to get out. I bet they left to go get a ladder or something. I wonder how far they plan on going?" Kyle kicked the shovel and it fell over and slid into the pit. There was a loud Clunk!

"Did you hear that?" Kyle jumped back into the hole. "Maybe if they stayed a while longer they would have found what they were searching for." John said.

In the pit Kyle was shoving the shovel into the soft earth searching for what made the clunk sound. He found it. He dug a little more then with his hands he pulled something out of the ground.

"What is it?" John asked. "I'm not sure here." Kyle held a box and John retrieved it. He placed the box onto the ground. It was an old wooden box held shut by nails. Kyle threw up the shovel and crawled back out. He put the point of the shovel into the lid of the box and pried it open.

https://66.media.tumblr.com/a4adee76422e...

There was a folded yellowed paper. Kyle picked it up. To their surprise underneath was filled to the brim with syringe needles! Like the ones they have at the Doctors office.

"Do you think its drugs?" John picked some up carefully. Most of them with clear liquid. There were also some with bright blue liquid.

Kyle shook his head. "This is really weird look what it says."

He handed John the paper.

Transformation Shots.

Transform your body into anyone you desire.

Instructions:

Harvest a person's DNA. This can be collected by retrieving hair, blood, etc. To create a shot of that person, you remove the top of the syringe and add the DNA to the clear mixture. The mixture will turn bright red signaling the shot is ready to use. Simply inject into your body and you will slowly start transforming into that person starting from that point. The same Transformation Shot can be used several times until the mixture is depleted. It is not necessary to inject all of the mixture in one shot. To speed up the changes you can inject in multiple spots.

This is very important! When transforming one's self, always create a back up syringe of your own DNA. If you fail to do this you may lose your original form forever.

The blue shot stops the transformation from spreading. This is good for partial body transformations when you do not want to completely change into the person.

If you fail to create a back up shot of your own DNA, the blue shot will not save your original form. If you use the shot half way through a transformation your new body will be whatever form you are in at that moment.

You may mix red shots of different people to create unique hybrids of that person. Just simply inject yourself with two different red shots if you want to create a hybrid of two people.

The tips of the shot needle are very thin and coated with a numbing solution so the Transformation Shots will not sting. This can be good for discreetly injecting a potential victim you wish to transform.



John shook his head. "What kind of idiot would inject themselves with this mystery liquid Look how old that paper and box looks?"

"I don't know, but someone obviously wanted to find this. There is only one way to find out I guess." Kyle placed the instructions back in the box and picked it up and started heading back to their apartment.

"Wait where are you going?" John asked.

"To see if I can find hair or something. We should get out of here before they get back anyways."

"Wait you are actually going to inject yourself with one of these shots?" John asked in disbelief.
112.title: Transformation Shots

"Kyle are you seriously thinking about trying this stuff? " John said as he hurried after him.

"Someone wanted this bad enough to hide it in the ground out in the forest and tried to dig it up again. Its got to do something." Kyle said seriously. They both went into the community laundry room of their apartments.

"Yeah but transforming into another person with a shot? Think about how crazy that sounds." John said.

Kyle was rummaging through a lost and found bin. He pulled out a black scarf and inspected it closely. His eyes lit up and he picked something off and held it up for John to see. "Look a blonde hair! This must be Lexis!" He put the old box on a changing table and took out a shot with clear liquid. He took the top off the top and dropped in the hair.

To both of their surprise the clear liquid instantly turned blood red.

Kyle put it in the box and looked around. There were a few chairs by the door of the laundry room. His eyes lit up and he plucked something off the fabric of a seat. He held it up. It was a long black hair. "Look this could be Katie's. We can see what its like to be a couple of chicks!"

John shook his head. That black hair could belong to any woman. Not only that he still didn't believe in the power of the Transformation Shots.

112112.content:
Kyle closed his eyes and lowered the needle to his arm.

"Wait!" Shouted John.

Kyle gave a sigh. "What is it?"

"We are supposed to create back up shots of ourselves remember? Unless you want to become a woman and never be able to get your old body back."

Kyle turned white. "Oh my god I forgot. Holy shit good thing you remembered. " Kyle took out two shots containing the clear liquid and handed one to John. Kyle plucked one of his own hairs and placed it in the top of the syringe. The liquid in the shot turned blood red.

John plucked a hair of his own and added it to his shot making a back up of himself. He picks up a black marker and writes his name on the shot he just made.

"Good idea." Kyle wrote his own name on his shot. They placed their backup shots on the coffee table and Kyle again held the blonde hair shot above his arm with a shaky hand.

"Ok here goes nothing!" He closes his eye and jabs his arm. The needed stuck out of his arm and stayed there on its own when he let go. Kyle had not pressed in the plunger yet to inject himself. He opened his eyes. "Wow the letter was right I don't feel this at all."

He put his hand on the needle and injected some of the red liquid. He only added about a quarter of the red liquid into his body. John stared at Kyle's arm hesitantly. Kyle's eyes were wide and intense. He seemed to also have second thoughts about this whole Transformation Shots thing. His mouth fell open.

John got closer to see. Kyle had some very fine hairs on his arm, but from the point he injected himself the hair began to disappear. It spread up his arm until his entire left arm was smooth.

"Jesus Christ." John said.

info.brief_description: Something unusual triggers a series of events that will change life as you once knew it.
info.description:
The story follows John. He is 22 and lives with his roommate Kyle who is the same age and both are single. They live on the second floor of an apartment. Right next to their apartment lives Lexi and Katie who are also of the same age. The boys fancy their attractive neighbors although they have not had a good chance to get to know each other.

It is a decent sized apartment complex where they have many different neighbors. In the center of the complex are community areas they all share such as an office, laundry room, gym, pool, etc.

All of their ordinary lives however, will never be quite the same after tonight.

Depending on what John happens to find tonight, there may be transformations, body swapping, weight gain, sex, and mayhem.

More characters can be added through out the story as needed. Everyone at the apartment is 18 or older.
